abstracts.cdata!:
The China Third Jiangxi Highway Project
            aims to improve east-west passenger and freight flows in
            Jiangxi province by investing in the construction of an
            expressway, enhancing local roads, and strengthening highway
            management. There are three project components. Component A,
            Ruijin-Anzhou Expressway (RGE), comprises a 117 km long
            section of the Xiamen-Chengdu expressway, which belongs to
            one of the east-west corridors of the National Trunk Highway
            System. Component B, the Local Roads Improvement Program,
            aims to improve access in poor areas of the province by
            upgrading existing roads in poor condition. Component C,
            Institutional Strengthening, reflects the current needs of
            the Jiangxi Provincial Communications Department in key
            areas. The component includes: (a) traffic safety operations
            for tunnels; (b) traffic safety improvement for expressways;
            (c) implementation of electronic toll collection; (d)
            training; and (e) equipment.
